title: Grant-Kohrs Ranch National Historic Site: Education
body: Roundup Resources with Grant-Kohrs Ranch Discover ways to wrangle your students' attention. Find lesson plans, plan your field trip, and discover ways to bring historic ranching into your classroom. Learn how Grant-Kohrs Ranch can help you meet your professional development needs or get information on our guest speaker programs. Read MoreÂ                  Adventures in the Wild Lesson Bring the adventure to your students with this cross-curricular lesson. Read More        Experience Grant-Kohrs Ranch Let your students step back in time and experience one of the first Montana cattle ranches! Read More        Horsin' Around Lesson Bring the ranch to your classroom through this exciting lesson. Read More        Summer Explorers Wish the learning didn't stop during the summer?  We give kids the opportunity to explore the natural & cultural world through fun activities. Read More        Junior Ranger Program We offer three junior ranger booklets for all ages. Download the free booklet from home before you visit or stop in the visitor center when you come. Read More        Join Grant-Kohrs Ranch NHS on Facebook "Like" us on Facebook today! Read More
